overview:
Ergode.com, an Ergode Inc. venture, went live on 21st of June in the year 2010.

In simple words, we have everything for every need. With around 60 book categories, containing 2.5 millions of books and millions of registered users, we aim to become one of the leading e-commerce players in the world. Our dictum is to make our customersâ€™ shopping experience a memorable one. Ergode.com features best budget deals on online shopping books, electronics, music, games, health and care products and automotives, among others. We also operate an online digital music store, which allows users to buy their choice of music amongst our selection of around 150 music categories. Whatever is your choice of music we have it all. Based out in Texas, US, Ergode.com specializes in best buy electronics online category with its best ever deals for best quality and branded products. Our Pledge to Customers: We, at Ergode, believe in offering our customers best and nationally recognized branded products in all categories. We sell all brand new products only. Hence we strive to obtain the good technology products at the lowest possible prices from a variety of suppliers.
